# 0 — Configuration

```{r config}
VINTAGE <- "2016"
YR1 <- 1996; YR2 <- 2006; YR3 <- 2016; YR4 <- 2026
PROJ_LABEL <- paste0(YR3, "-", YR4)

CSV_PATH <- file.path(path.expand("~"), "Documents", "SHRS_Analysis",
                       "market_analysis", "v3data", "projections_csv",
                       "labor_force_csv", "2016",
                       "2016_labor-force - Table 3.1.csv")
```

# 1 — Load & Clean

This vintage has a multi-row header — skip 5 rows to reach data.

```{r load}
raw <- read_csv(CSV_PATH, skip = 5, col_names = FALSE, show_col_types = FALSE)

# Force 18 standard column names
names(raw) <- c("group",
                "lf_yr1","lf_yr2","lf_yr3","lf_yr4",
                "chg_12","chg_23","chg_34",
                "pct_chg_12","pct_chg_23","pct_chg_34",
                "dist_yr1","dist_yr2","dist_yr3","dist_yr4",
                "cagr_12","cagr_23","cagr_34")

clean_num <- function(x) {
  x <- str_remove_all(as.character(x), ",")
  x <- str_trim(x)
  x[x %in% c("\u2014","\u2013","—","-","NA","",".")] <- NA
  suppressWarnings(as.numeric(x))
}

raw <- raw |>
  mutate(group = str_trim(as.character(group))) |>
  filter(!is.na(group), group != "", !str_detect(group, "^Footnote|^Note:|^Source:|^\\[|^\\(")) |>
  mutate(across(-group, clean_num)) |>
  filter(!is.na(lf_yr3))
```

```{r dq, results='asis'}
cat(paste0("**Vintage:** ", VINTAGE, " | **Projection:** ", PROJ_LABEL,
           " | **Rows:** ", nrow(raw), "\n"))
```

# 2 — Total Labor Force

```{r total}
total <- raw |> filter(str_detect(group, "^Total"))

tibble(
  Metric = c(paste0("LF ",YR1," (000s)"), paste0("LF ",YR2," (000s)"),
             paste0("LF ",YR3," (000s)"), paste0("LF ",YR4," proj (000s)"),
             paste0("Growth ",YR3,"-",YR4," (%)"), paste0("CAGR (%)")),
  Value = c(total$lf_yr1, total$lf_yr2, total$lf_yr3, total$lf_yr4,
            total$pct_chg_34, total$cagr_34)
) |>
  mutate(Value = ifelse(abs(Value)>100, format(Value, big.mark=","), as.character(round(Value,1)))) |>
  kable(caption = "Total Labor Force Summary") |>
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options=c("striped","hover"), full_width=FALSE)

lf_growth_pct <- total$pct_chg_34
lf_cagr <- total$cagr_34
lf_current <- total$lf_yr3
lf_projected <- total$lf_yr4
```

---

# 3 — Growth Trend

```{r trend, fig.height=5}
tibble(
  Period = factor(c(paste0(YR1,"-",YR2), paste0(YR2,"-",YR3), paste0(YR3,"-",YR4)),
                  levels = c(paste0(YR1,"-",YR2), paste0(YR2,"-",YR3), paste0(YR3,"-",YR4))),
  Growth = c(total$pct_chg_12, total$pct_chg_23, total$pct_chg_34),
  Type = c("Historical","Historical","Projected")
) |>
  ggplot(aes(x=Period, y=Growth, fill=Type)) +
  geom_col(width=0.5) +
  geom_text(aes(label=paste0(Growth,"%")), vjust=-0.3, size=4.5) +
  scale_fill_manual(values=c("Historical"="#2c7bb6","Projected"="#f39c12")) +
  labs(title=paste0("LF Growth (",VINTAGE," Vintage)"), x=NULL, y="% Change", fill=NULL) +
  theme_minimal(base_size=13) + theme(legend.position="bottom")
```

# 4 — Demographics

## 4.1 Gender

```{r gender}
gender <- raw |> filter(str_detect(group, "^Men|^Women|^\\s+Men|^\\s+Women"))
if (nrow(gender) > 0) {
  gender |> mutate(group = str_trim(group)) |>
    select(Group=group, !!paste0("LF ",YR3):=lf_yr3, `Growth (%)`=pct_chg_34) |>
    head(4) |>
    kable(digits=1, caption="LF by Gender") |>
    kable_styling(bootstrap_options=c("striped","hover"), full_width=FALSE)
}
```

## 4.2 Race/Ethnicity

```{r race}
race <- raw |>
  filter(str_detect(group, "^\\s*White|^\\s*Black|^\\s*Asian|^\\s*All other|^\\s*Hispanic|^\\s*Other than|^\\s*White non")) |>
  mutate(group = str_trim(group))

if (nrow(race) > 0) {
  race |>
    select(Group=group, !!paste0("LF ",YR3," (K)"):=lf_yr3, `Growth (%)`=pct_chg_34,
           !!paste0("Share ",YR3):=dist_yr3, !!paste0("Share ",YR4):=dist_yr4) |>
    kable(digits=1, caption="LF by Race/Ethnicity") |>
    kable_styling(bootstrap_options=c("striped","hover"), full_width=FALSE)
}
```

## 4.3 Age

```{r age}
age <- raw |>
  filter(str_detect(group, "^\\s*\\d+\\s+to\\s+\\d+|^\\s*55 and|^\\s*65 and|^\\s*75 and")) |>
  mutate(group = str_trim(group))
if (nrow(age) > 0) {
  age |>
    select(Age=group, !!paste0("LF ",YR3):=lf_yr3, !!paste0("LF ",YR4):=lf_yr4, `Growth (%)`=pct_chg_34) |>
    kable(digits=1, caption="Age Groups") |>
    kable_styling(bootstrap_options=c("striped","hover"), full_width=FALSE)
}
```
